name: Rachel Beckham
text: Love this place. Plenty of options for all types of diets, paper straws, laid back. We just watched a man throw a temper tantrum because he was asked to put on a mask and the staff handled it excellently. Love having Mellow Mushroom in our neighborhood ‚ù§

name: Kaitlyn White
text: I absolutely love coming here! Not only are the atmosphere and decorations amazing but the food is great! Fun place to go with family!!

name: Frog Price
text: Katie was our server. She did an excellent job helping us with our order. We used the scan feature on the phone to see the menu as part of their Covid-19 precautions. ‚Ä¶More

name: Jessica Spinks
text: Pizza was amazing! Made it half and half and they made sure not to have the toppings bleed over. Pretzels and beer cheese is a must have and staff was great!

name: Madiki
text: Wonderful experience! The food was amazing as usual and came out in decent time. Wait staff kept our drinks topped off and made sure we had what we needed. Good vegetarian options and also has tofu/tempeh you can add. We got the Holy Shiitake and the veggie pizza with tempeh added.

name: Freddy Edgerton
text: Love pizza and love mellow mushroom.  BIG  plus, vegan cheese. Wife has dairy allergies,  but she can still enjoy a Mellow Mushroom pizza.

name: Ty Reed
text: Friendly service, but the pizza was do thin that the pills from the cheese and pepperoni's completely soaked through.

name: Leslie Hahn
text: This place was amazing! Our server was absolutely fantastic, Quick Service friendly customer service could not ask for more!

name: Em M
text: Food is always good, service isn't.

name: marissa baker
text: You better know what you want before you get there. Waited 30 minutes and still wasn‚Äôt asked what we wanted. And it was slow. Disappointed and will not be back.

name: Brandon Sherwood
text: Ordered 2 large pizzas. Extremely dissapointed in the amount of cheese on my pizzas. Mellow mushroom should be ashmaed of themsleves that Little Caesare's $5 pizza has WAY more cheese than Mellow Mjushroom's $20 pizza. In addition, called ‚Ä¶More

name: Haley Nunn
text: Food is always great at any Mellow Mushroom. However, my Husband and I have been to this location three times and it has taken over an hour to get our food. No explanation, no warning that it would take that long.  Mellow is our favorite ‚Ä¶More

name: Kimberly Small
text: Good service, good vegan foods, friendly staff & fast service!

name: Van Jones
text: Placed an order over the phone and when I came to pick it up they couldn‚Äôt understand my name until the third time. When they finally did figure out my order, my wife and eyes pizza was ready but my kids pizza took another 15 minutes. They ‚Ä¶More

name: Jake G
text: One of our favorite places to eat. Has vegan-gluten free options, which is awesome. Take longer than normal pizza, just enjoy the shroomy hippie vibes and listen to good indie music from the speakers.

name: Gloria Canul
text: Usually I can look past one issue if other things make up for it, but if food and service are both subpar I have to be honest about it. The servers move agonizingly slow and the cooks are afraid to put enough sauce on the pizza so it isn't ‚Ä¶More

name: Melinda Darby
text: Pizza was good.  We ordered to large Vegan (Veg Out) Pizzas with 3 additional toppings total and the price was $75.00 for them.  Way too much for 2 large Pizzas

name: Mike Hiatt
text: Great pizza, service, and cool environment. The best Mellow Mushroom that I have been to.

name: Mitch Smotherman
text: Definitely the most sub par mellow mushroom I‚Äôve had. The pretzel bites aren‚Äôt even pretzel, they‚Äôre just bread bites

name: Kristine Hankins
text: Super friendly üòä great vibe

name: DAWN MCINTYRE
text: Chill factor, great food, fun atmosphere.  Food was not expensive and great quality and quantity.

name: Chris Manning
text: Delicious pizza and great atmosphere!

name: Bailee Hollis
text: We had the buffalo wings and the mighty meaty pizza, both were delicious! Our server was a riot too, very fun to talk to. We came in on Trivia Night and we are already planning to come back next time! Overall a great meal! I can't wait to try some of the unique pies for this location

name: Wilaysia Beauford
text: Vegan out pizza was good thanks

name: FeedTheTeethMachine
text: Waited 5 minutes on a Friday night to get a table, but ended up waiting 40 minutes before leaving after only being served drinks. Doesn't feel too good when the table next to you is being served and offered free drinks for a 10 minute wait.

name: Robert Brothers
text: Slow and dark atmosphere

name: Melissa Snider
text:
UPDATE: The owner contacted me to say my experience was out of the norm and offer to make it right. Now it‚Äôs up to the staff to up their game.
On a slow weekend evening (about 1/2 tables occupied), it was so loud I couldn‚Äôt ‚Ä¶More

name: Richard Freeman
text: The pizza is good.  How to pick up the pizza is not clear at all have to check in with hostes who sends you to the bar. Where I was ignored for a while finally someone asked me and got my order. And the prices are pretty astronomical for pizza.  Even though the pizza was good they are a bit to proud of it.

name: Mary Waldman
text: So far the best pizza we've found in Birmingham. This is the shiitake pizza with truffle sauce and it was amazing. Great staff, clean, nice restrooms. We'll be back.

name: Scott Clement
text: Love the pizza service is okay. Good people just slow.

name: Jason Collier
text: Good pizza and great service. We just had my daughters birthday there and had a God time!

name: Nora Samayoa
text: Waiters were very rude, to the point that they talked to us in a negative way. Very disappointed since I have not had a problem with service here before. I do not recommend this location based on the horrible service and how long it took ‚Ä¶More

name: Phillip Curren
text: I get the relaxed working environment! I planned a nice pizza outing with my kids but was meet with a waitress with a terrible attitude keep complaining about being busy and didn‚Äôt want to be there. That wasn‚Äôt the first experience with lazy waitress at mellow mushroom.  Go a few miles down the road and visit Slice pizza.

name: Andrea Goodman
text: Ordered the steak and cheese sub and I have to say it was super gristlely and chewy. Had to spit most of it out! For the price I was very disappointed. Makes subway taste like a 4 star restaurant! Don‚Äôt do  it. Also they added everything I asked to be taken off! Waste of money and waited almost an hour for my food!

name: Nikkis ASMR
text: We‚Äôve gone there one other time and it was great but this time we went and me and my boyfriend got sat all the way in the back at a really small table that could barely fit a pizza at all. We sat there for half an hour waiting for someone ‚Ä¶More

name: Pete Horton
text: Always good pizza, a little pricey but fresh ingredients keep this on our pizza tour.   Funky decorations may be due for an update soon.

name: Kevin Gardner
text: Great place to eat some pizza with friends. Ample seating, a friendly atmosphere, and great staff.

name: Katy Stone
text: Pizza tasted good but the service killed the whole night.   Little girl wearing a beanie obviously hates her job and it shows.  We ordered two drinks, he reminded her after 10 min and finally got his.  Mine never came the whole meal.  Any ‚Ä¶More

name: Griffin Crumrine
text: If you're vegan this is one of the few places in Huntsbille that has you covered on comfort foods. Wonderful selection of beers too.

name: Jay Jones
text: I love mellow mushroom but this location wasnt the best.With every mellow mushroom the wait for the food is long because it's baked fresh so be expecting a 30 min wait on food and account for that no matter which location. We were promptly ‚Ä¶More

name: Ju Mc
text: On a Sunday morning (1156am) the sign wasn't on and we were unsure of them being open. The host identified they were open and sat us. He took our drink order and a few moments later he took our food order. A little slow but no problems up ‚Ä¶More

name: Kaylene Peters
text: It's great that they started using only nongmo/Round up products, hopefully they'll offer an organic raw vegan menu soon

name: Summer Owens
text: Our server was very nice but not good at all. No refills for a long time, not available when we were ready to order or had check timely. We were there for almost 2 hours for just a small pizza, salad and 2 sandwiches. Also a little over priced. $70 for that food and 3 drinks. Not worth it.

name: William Smith
text: Horrible service! All the previous reviews were correct! Will NEVER go to this place again! The owner should have his franchise revoked! This obviously has went on for way too long! Pathetic!

name: Amy D
text: Horrible service!  We ordered four drinks.  They brought mine and two of my kid's drinks but forgot my youngest daughter's.  It took 20 minutes to flag someone down to get her one.  We ordered a total of three items.  It took 30 minutes to ‚Ä¶More

name: Justin Maddox
text: I used to go here a lot for lunch but haven't been in forever because service was awful last time I went. No one at the host station up front. Waited forever to get seated and took even longer to order and get food. The restaurant was dead which made everything that much worse.

name: Cheryl Star
text: Great pizzas! I was there for a birthday party. They have the COOLEST metal artwork & great pictures in the wall.  Awesome atmosphere.  Great service tho we were I balcony!you should go check it out. (WARNING: take your paycheck if your ‚Ä¶More

name: Linda Lowery
text: We had the house special pizza which was really great.. tons of meat and cheese and also had one of the best margaritas I've ever tasted and had the sweetest server.. I'm really bad with names but I think her name was Chelsea.. we will definently be going back..

name: Ronald Clifton
text: Good food. Had small Maui pizza.

name: Sandra Cross
text: This has got to be the most awkward experience I‚Äôve ever had at a restaurant. We were seated right in front of the kitchen and we had the opportunity to witness every employee not doing their job (hugging each other, on their phones, etc.) ‚Ä¶More

name: DGT 101610
text: The service was excellent.  The waitress stopped by often enough to keep us satisfied.  Plus, she was very pleasant. Additionally, the restaurant presented a family environment. It was warm and inviting. The food was exceptional. A little ‚Ä¶More

text: Food was good, two meals were a bit burnt but that's not a huge deal. Staff were friendly but our particular waitress didn't do much. It was a bit busy but our waitress passed by our table several times serving other tables. We didn't get ‚Ä¶More

name: Chris Jones
text: We go to mellow mushroom fairly often my wife and son love the pizza . I on the other hand think it‚Äôs just ok. I do however love there pretzels they are delicious. Service at this one was prompt and our server was nice and kept our drinks refilled would have no problem going back to this restaurant.

name: Jess Lewis
text: Great vegan pizza and the service is always great!

name: Holly Lanther
text: Not up to Mellow Mushroom standards. Sandwich did not have all of the ingredients , same for the pizza. Beer taps not working.

text: Our waitress seemed overwhelmed and hid behind the register in order to not deal with any customers. This caused very slow service and cold food.

name: Elisabeth Fischer
text: The pizza is delicious and they are great

name: J Russell
text: My family and I love Mellow Mushroom. We were so excited to have lunch out yesterday! My husband and I, our 3 kids, and my sister in-law. We ordered soft pretzels and beer cheese for an appetizer, 2 pizzas, and a kids meatball dish. The ‚Ä¶More

name: Chris Linden
text: Great pizza.  Love their crust. Everything is fresh. Friendly staff even when busy. Not cheap but worth every penny.

name: David Jones
text: While the pizza and service was good the subs (2 steak and cheese and meatball) were horrible. They lacked any kind of seasoning or taste.  We probably should have asked for a refund but didn't.

name: Janice Quick
text: My fav pizza place.  The best is the house pizza and with pesto instead of tomato sauce.  Service is wonderful.

text: It was ok. Kind of pricey and the sandwich I got was not what I wanted. They didn't ask how I would like my sandwich made and when it did come, I was disappointed.

name: David Morgan
text: Great food, great service, beautiful and friendly staff. If you have food allergies these guys will take care of you every single time. I don't know if it's the hiring or training but Mellow Mushroom has the best employees any company could ask for from a customer perspective.
